1.content: Alrighty, welcome to the interactive of your dreams dear reader! Before we begin, from what anime shall you giantesses hail from?
1.title: Start!

11.content: Which one of these wonderful kunoichi is going to be the giantess?
11.title: Naruto

13.content: Alright! Now who will be the focus of this interactive? (Keep in mind that other girls are free to come and go, but this girl will be the center!)
13.title: Bleach

131.content: Okay! Now pick any plot!
131.title: Rukia

1311.content: Now the fun can begin! Quick question, are you a boy, or a girl?
1311.title: Plot 1

choices: I met her in the world of the living
131122.content: Alright Mira! So, how do you know Rukia?
131122.title: Mira

choices: Depends on what I'm feeling (Can control your size)
1311223.content: Truly? Well no time like the present! So tell me, how tall are you?
1311223.title: I don't know her

13112233.content:
Interesting. Well, best start you off then!

You were walking down the quiet streets of your home town. The silence was calm, filled with the jovial tune of your whistled song. As you made your merry way back home, you felt something.
13112233.title: Depends on what I'm feeling (Can control yo...

131122331.content:
Your whistling stops. Something was... wrong. Everything seems quiet, much more so than it just had been a few seconds ago. And what was with this feeling of being watched? You look about your surroundings, and spot a monster.

The creature looks like a giant humanoid, with a white mask in the shape of some strange disfigured face. You scream in horror as the creature comes at you, running full speed. You hardly have time to think!
131122331.title: The silence becomes ominous

1311223312.content: Almost instinctively, you shrink, your height dropping just quickly enough to avoid the open jaws of the monster. Clearly confused, the beast turn around, looking for you as you try to sneak away.
1311223312.title: Shrink down!

13112233121.content:
Suddenly, it catches sight of you. You scream in fear as it loom over you, ready to strike, when suddenly it stops, gasping in shock. Then, just as suddenly, its mask splits in two, and the creature dissipates, leaving behind only a woman in a black kimono with a katana in hand.

She was cute. Her black hair and purple eyes, as well as her graceful pose with sword in hand, you couldn't help but wonder of you were looking at a goddess of swordplay.

She lands on the ground, shaking her blade off before sheathing it.
13112233121.title: It notices you

131122331211.content:
"W-Wow..." you mutter in shock, before gasping and covering your mouth. The woman's eyes widen, and she looks at you in surprise, causing you to flinch.

"What is that?" she says walking closer. You swallow nervously and try to run away, only to be caught as her hand grabs you by the jacket and lifts you up. "A miniature human? And you can see me?"

"I-I'm sorry! I was just walking home and that thing came in out of nowhere, I didn't mean to get in the way!" you manage to sputter out.

"Hmm, I need time to investigate this." Suddenly you find yourself being brought closer to the woman's chest as she opens her kimono up, depositing you in a pocket within the robe, before leaping off.

"H-Hey! Let me out!" you cry as the strange woman begins to run, but your protests are ignored. "Great, kidnapped by some strange lady with a sword who fights monsters. Just what have you gotten yourself into this time Mira?"

Rukia was perplexed, she'd never seen a human like this. I mean sure, she'd heard tale of humans being able to see spirits and hollows, but not soul reapers. Not to mention her size! She was incredibly small, smaller than even an infant! She needed time to investigate this, and so she leaped up onto the roof of a tall building, reaching her lookout spot.

She sighed as she looked over the small city. With the population size of the area, hollows were constantly showing up, so she had to be vigilant. Still though, she had some time before the next one would show, perfect to investigate the strange human she found.

She pulled you out and looked you over. She just couldn't fathom how a human could be so small. Was it some kind of birth defect? A curse? Maybe an illusion? Her finger traced your body, ignoring you protests as she felt you small form. It felt real enough, perhaps this was a real human after all.

"C-Could you stop that?" you cry, catching her attention. She took notice of your intense blush, and shortened breath.

"Hmm, blushing over a girl holding you? You're a pervert aren't you?" Rukia said grinning.

"H-Hey! Don't blame me for getting like this when some strange woman starts touching me all over!" you stammer.

"Oh right, my apologies," Rukia says, setting you in her lap. "What are you? I've never seen a human so small before."

"I'm a regular human girl thank you very much! I just have the ability to alter my size... for some reason..."

"Hmm, doesn't sound very convincing."

"Hey I'm the only known human who can do this so it's not like I have all the answers okay?"

"Well why don't you grow back?"

"Huh?"

"You're in the captivity of a strange woman, a woman you shouldn't be able to perceive I might add, and you haven't grown back yet. How come?"
131122331211.title: "W-Wow..."

1311223312112.content:
"I... I can't," you sigh.

"What? Why not?" Rukia asks.

"Well whenever I change sizes, I have to wait thirty minutes before I can do it again. Since I just did it, I've got about 25 minutes left," you reply.

"I see, so you have limits on this ability of yours. Well you certainly picked an inopportune time to use it."

"I was panicking okay? It was the only thing I could think to do!" you shout up at her before sighing and sitting back down in her lap.

"Well I was supposed to kill that hollow earlier but it got away from me so this is partly my fault. I suppose I can keep you safe until you can change back."

"Oh uh... thanks?"

"You're welcome." Rukia's gaze then turns outwards towards the city, looking over the calm and quiet night. Your gaze follows, and you notice how pretty the view is from up here. Getting comfy, you sit back against her stomach. She looks at you questioningly for a moment, before shrugging and putting and arm over your lap, to make sure you don't fall.

"So uh, who are you anyway?"

"My name is Rukia Kuchiki, and I am a Soul Reaper."

"A soul reaper? You mean like a grim reaper?! Taking people's souls once they die?!"

"Indeed."

"Oh god, if I can see you does that mean I'm dead?!?"

"No it doesn't. It's rare for humans to be able to see spirits, but it happens often enough not to be surprising. Though seeing a soul reaper is a lot more difficult, but again not unheard of. I suppose you're one of those special cases."

"Okay good, I thought you were here to take my soul."

"I don't take souls, I send them to the soul society, a peaceful place where spirits are safe from hollows."

"Huh, so that's what those monsters are?"

"Indeed, Hollows are former spirits that remained in the realm of the living for too long, and became corrupted, turning into monsters that devour souls. By killing them, I cleanse the hollow of its corruption and sin, and send the true soul to the soul society."

"Huh, neat." you then sit in silence, finding yourself enjoying this peaceful time with this beautiful woman. After all, this was probably just a one time thing, so you were taking full advantage of it."
1311223312112.title: "I can't..."

13112233121121.content:
Suddenly, a beeping sound goes off in Rukia's robe, and she reaches into the inner pocket, pulling out something that looked like an old phone. Looking it over, her eyes squint and she sighs.

"Looks like another hollow showed up," Rukia sighed. She then looked down at you, a serious expression on her face. "I'll still keep you with me, but you need to do everything I say alright?"

"Sure thing!" you reply as Rukia picks you up and places you on her shoulder. You hang on tight as she leaps off the building and begins jumping from roof to roof, heading for her prey.

Eventually she finds it, a strange almost crab looking thing, and she pulls out her katana, prepared to fight. The beast roars and charges her, but Rukia dodges it easily, and drives her blade into the beast's head, destroying it.

"Well that was easy," you said.

"Indeed, that hollow must have just formed. A shame I didn't get to the soul within it before it was corrupted." Suddenly you gasp, and Rukia gives you a strange look. "What's up with you?"

"My times up, I can grow back now."

"I see." Rukia takes you from her shoulder and sets you down on the ground. From there, you grown back to full height, which happens to make you only a bit taller than Rukia herself.

"Well uh, thanks for protecting me!" you smile. "See you later I guess?"

"Unlikely," Rukia replied, and without a word more she left, leaping into the night. You watched her go, sad that you might not ever see her again, but content with your little meeting for now.

'No,' you mentally decided. 'I'll see her again, one day."

With that, you headed home.
13112233121121.title: Rukia's communicator beeps

131122331211211.content:
The night after your brief encounter with Rukia, you found yourself walking home alone again. Aware of the dangers of hollows now, you were trying to be cautious, checking every corner before you rounded it, and keeping an ear open for the sounds of a lumbering beast.

As you walked, you passed by an alleyway, where you heard the sound of an injured cat. You animal lover instincts kicking in, you dashed into the alleyway to help the poor kitty. You eventually found it, trapped behind a dumpster with its tail caught under a loose brick. You strain to push the dumpster aside, but you manage, and rescue the poor kitty, freeing its tail, and smiling as you watched it run off. As it did so, the cat stopped and turned to look at you, meowing its thanks, before running off, leaving you with a bright smile.

That's when you heard the breathing.

Turning around, you screamed at the giant hollow that had appeared behind you. This one looked like a praying mantis, with a human skull mask. It roared as one of its giant scythe like arms swung at you.
131122331211211.title: The next night

15533321.title: Personified giantess countries here we come!

choices: Europe, Asia, Africa, North America, or Oceania
155333211.content: Okay-do we focus on Europe, Asia, Africa, North America, or Oceania? Or just a mystery?
155333211.title: Minor-they don't get enough time to be in t...

1553332112.content: Okay then. You've chosen mystery. The next chapter is just going to say 'Onwards' as the title.
1553332112.title: Mystery

15533321121.content:
Canada moaned as she rolled over in her sleep, then her violet-indigo eyes opened in pain as she gasped, curling up into a ball. Her bones began to creak as they began to change.
Canada gasped as her body began to change painfully, her normally unheard yells of pain becoming louder and louder as the level of the pain increased. Then, finally, mercifully, she fell unconscious. What happened?
15533321121.title: Onwards

155333211211.content:
When Canada woke up, her vision was obscured by something...something red. Then she realized what it was, and the Canadian female blushed so deeply one would have sworn she was a red traffic light. It was her panties, which were laying on top of her. The busty Canadian had shrunk down, but she couldn't tell to what height.
She shrieked as there was a loud bang, and her world violently shook up and down. She could only pray it was someone kind and merciful. A voice said, "What happened?" And as she turned, she realized who it was.
155333211211.title: She shrunk!

1553332112111.content:
Ukraine looked down at her red panties, and she felt her breathe hitching as the giant, busty Ukrainian woman reached down. Canada had to find a way to alert her to the situation before long, or even before the Ukrainian decided to put the red panties on, sending her into the womb...wait, where did that thought come from?
More importantly, why was Ukraine here? Coincidence, or simply because she was looking for her?
1553332112111.title: Ukraine

15533321121112.content:
"I was looking for Canada," Ukraine murmured. "And I think I know where she is." Canada's heart rose as Ukraine swiftly yanked on the red panties, revealing her.

"I don't know what happened!" She shouted, waving her arms in the air as Katyusha looked at her in disbelief. "I woke up like this!" Ukraine nodded, and picked up the shrunken Canadian female.

"You're so cute," Ukraine muttered. There was something in her aqua blue eyes that Madeleine couldn't make out. What was it?
15533321121112.title: Looking

155333211211121.content:
There was a low, but audible growl emanating from Ukraine, and both realized it was hunger. Canada was already in Ukraine's hand, and she fearfully looked up at the Ukrainian giantess. Without a second thought, Ukraine began to speak. "Don't worry Maddie, I won't digest you." With that said, she raised the equally busty Canadian woman above her head, high above her open maw, and dropped Madeleine in.
Katyusha rolled her friend-turned-prey around in her mouth, enjoying the flavour and the squirming Canada was giving her, albeit unwillingly. She moaned as the last of her crush's flavour drained away, and she swallowed, tracing the Canadian's path into her groaning and gurgling belly with a hand, sighing as the other woman arrived in her gut. "Hey! Let me out!" She heard her friend yell, although it was muffled by both the moaning organ and the thick, slimy walls of flesh.
"I already told you," Ukraine said, her voice light, "I'm not going to digest you." Katyusha smiled as she felt her crush's squirms fade away after a moment, and as Madeleine sat down on the fleshy floor of her gut.
Ukraine sighed, and, since her stomach was now apparently full, fell asleep quickly, one hand on her belly as she took off her clothes in her sleep.
155333211211121.title: Hunger

15533322.title: More choices of course

info.brief_description: Ever wanted to have some fun with giant anime girls? This is the place to be!
info.description:
Ever wanted to have some fun with giant anime girls? This is the place to be! Warning, +18 stuff will be allowed in this interactive, so watch out for your innocence!

Things allowed include:
Vore,
Digestion (You must be reborn afterwards)
Unbirth,
Futa,
Lactation,
Butt,
Breasts,
Feet,
+18

Not allowed:
Death,
Scat,
Farts,

I will be removing chapter that have bad grammer, or are only one sentence unless the chapter is simply serving the purpose of offering more routes for other people to take, so please be aware!
